policy: Products can be returned within 14 days of delivery.
Refunds are processed within 5 business days after receiving the returned item.
Products must be unused and in original packaging.
Electronics and personalized items are non-returnable.
If a return is due to a defective item, we cover shipping costs.
Return requests must include the original receipt or order ID.
Partial refunds are not provided for used items.
Refunds are processed using the original payment method.
Exchanges are allowed for items of equal value only.
Sale items can be returned within 7 days of delivery.
Items must be securely packaged to prevent damage during return shipping.
Return shipping labels are provided for all eligible returns.
Customer support will approve the return before shipment.
Damaged items reported within 48 hours are eligible for immediate refund.
Gift items can be returned for store credit only.
